name: Buffalo Chicken Salad Bowls
author: Nora Wehmer
summary: A delicious husband-approved salad filled with fresh ingredients! Garnish with shredded cheese and croutons if desired.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
3 tablespoons cayenne pepper sauce (such as Frank's® RedHot®)
½ head lettuce, chopped, or to taste
4 tablespoons ranch dressing, or to taste
directions: Heat olive oil in a pan on medium heat
Season chicken tenders with salt and pepper
Place in the hot oil and cook until golden brown, 4 to 5 minutes per side
Remove chicken to a bowl and set aside
Add cayenne pepper sauce and butter to the pan
Cook and stir until thickened, about 1 minute
Mix well until all chicken pieces are well covered
Divide lettuce, cabbage, tomato, avocado, and red onion between 2 bowls
